  var i,x   ,   a   =   d   o   c   u   m   e   n   t   .    }

           i   f   (   !            f   o   r   (   i   =   0   ;   !   x   &amp;   &amp;   d   .   l   a   y   e   r   s   &amp;   &amp;   i   &lt;   d   .   l   a   y   e   r   s   .   l   e   n   g   t   h   ;   i   +   +   )       x   =   M   M   _   f   i   n   d   O   b   j   (   n   ,   d   .   l   a   y   e   r   s   [   i   ]   .   d   o   c   u   m   e   n   t   )   ;   
           i   f   (   !   x       &amp;   &amp;       d   o   c   u   m   e   n   t   .   g   e   t   E   l   e   m   e   n   t   B   y   I   d   )       x   =   d   o   c   u   m   e   n   t   .   g   e   t   E   l   e   m   e   n   t   B   y   I   d   (   n   )   ;       r   e   t   u   r   n       x   ;   
   }

   (   a   d   s   b   y   g   o   o   g   l   e       =       w   i   n   d   o   w   .   a   d   s   b   y   g   o   o   g   l   e       |   |       [   ]   )   .   p   u   s   h   (   {   }   )   ;

           &lt;   /   t   r   &gt;   
           &lt;   t   r   &gt;   
                   &lt;   t   d   &gt;

                                   &lt;   t   r   &gt;   
                                           &lt;   t   d       w   i   d   t   h   =   "   7   2   "   &gt;   &lt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   f   r   e   e   w   e   b   m   a   s   t   e   r   h   e   l   p   .   c   o   m   /   t   u   t   o   r   i   a   l   s   "       o   n   M   o   u   s   e   O   u   t   =   "   M   M   _   s   w   a   p   I   m   g   R   e   s   t   o   r   e   (   )   "       o   n   M   o   u   s   e   O   v   e   r   =   "   M   M   _   s   w   a   p   I   m   a   g   e   (   '   I   m   a   g   e   2   '   ,   '   '   ,   '   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   f   r   e   e   w   e   b   m   a   s   t   e   r   h   e   l   p   .   c   o   m   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   e   l   e   m   e   n   t   s   /   d   e   s   2   _   r   2   _   c   2   .   g   i   f   '   ,   1   )   "   &gt;   &lt;   i   m   g       n   a   m   e   =   "   I   m   a   g   e   2   "       b   o   r   d   e   r   =   "   0   "       s   r   c   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   f   r   e   e   w   e   b   m   a   s   t   e   r   h   e   l   p   .   c   o   m   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   e   l   e   m   e   n   t   s   /   d   e   s   _   r   2   _   c   2   .   g   i   f   "       w   i   d   t   h   =   "   7   2   "       h   e   i   g   h   t   =   "   3   2   "       a   l   t   =   "   T   u   t   o   r   i   a   l   s   "   &gt;   &lt;   /   a   &gt;   &lt;   /   t   d   &gt;   
                                           &lt;   t   d       w   i   d   t   h   =   "   7   2   "   &gt;   &lt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   f   r   e   e   w   e   b   m   a   s   t   e   r   h   e   l   p   .   c   o   m   /   a   r   t   i   c   l   e   s   "       o   n   M   o   u   s   e   O   u   t   =   "   M   M   _   s   w   a   p   I   m   g   R   e   s   t   o   r   e   (   )   "       o   n   M   o   u   s   e   O   v   e   r   =   "   M   M   _   s   w   a   p   I   m   a   g   e   (   '   I   m   a   g   e   3   '   ,   '   '   ,   '   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   f   r   e   e   w   e   b   m   a   s   t   e   r   h   e   l   p   .   c   o   m   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   e   l   e   m   e   n   t   s   /   d   e   s   2   _   r   2   _   c   3   .   g   i   f   '   ,   1   )   "   &gt;   &lt;   i   m   g       n   a   m   e   =   "   I   m   a   g   e   3   "       b   o   r   d   e   r   =   "   0   "       s   r   c   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   f   r   e   e   w   e   b   m   a   s   t   e   r   h   e   l   p   .   c   o   m   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   e   l   e   m   e   n   t   s   /   d   e   s   _   r   2   _   c   3   .   g   i   f   "       w   i   d   t   h   =   "   7   2   "       h   e   i   g   h   t   =   "   3   2   "       a   l   t   =   "   A   r   t   i   c   l   e   s   "   &gt;   &lt;   /   a   &gt;   &lt;   /   t   d   &gt;   
                                           &lt;   t   d       w   i   d   t   h   =   "   7   2   "   &gt;   &lt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   f   r   e   e   w   e   b   m   a   s   t   e   r   h   e   l   p   .   c   o   m   /   t   o   o   l   s   /   "       o   n   M   o   u   s   e   O   u   t   =   "   M   M   _   s   w   a   p   I   m   g   R   e   s   t   o   r   e   (   )   "       o   n   M   o   u   s   e   O   v   e   r   =   "   M   M   _   s   w   a   p   I   m   a   g   e   (   '   I   m   a   g   e   4   '   ,   '   '   ,   '   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   f   r   e   e   w   e   b   m   a   s   t   e   r   h   e   l   p   .   c   o   m   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   e   l   e   m   e   n   t   s   /   d   e   s   2   _   r   2   _   c   5   .   g   i   f   '   ,   1   )   "   &gt;   &lt;   i   m   g       n   a   m   e   =   "   I   m   a   g   e   4   "       b   o   r   d   e   r   =   "   0   "       s   r   c   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   f   r   e   e   w   e   b   m   a   s   t   e   r   h   e   l   p   .   c   o   m   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   e   l   e   m   e   n   t   s   /   d   e   s   _   r   2   _   c   5   .   g   i   f   "       w   i   d   t   h   =   "   7   2   "       h   e   i   g   h   t   =   "   3   2   "       a   l   t   =   "   T   o   o   l   s   "   &gt;   &lt;   /   a   &gt;   &lt;   /   t   d   &gt;   
                                           &lt;   t   d       w   i   d   t   h   =   "   7   2   "   &gt;   &lt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   f   r   e   e   w   e   b   m   a   s   t   e   r   h   e   l   p   .   c   o   m   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   .   p   h   p   "       o   n   M   o   u   s   e   O   u   t   =   "   M   M   _   s   w   a   p   I   m   g   R   e   s   t   o   r   e   (   )   "       o   n   M   o   u   s   e   O   v   e   r   =   "   M   M   _   s   w   a   p   I   m   a   g   e   (   '   I   m   a   g   e   5   '   ,   '   '   ,   '   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   f   r   e   e   w   e   b   m   a   s   t   e   r   h   e   l   p   .   c   o   m   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   e   l   e   m   e   n   t   s   /   d   e   s   2   _   r   2   _   c   8   .   g   i   f   '   ,   1   )   "   &gt;   &lt;   i   m   g       n   a   m   e   =   "   I   m   a   g   e   5   "       b   o   r   d   e   r   =   "   0   "       s   r   c   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   f   r   e   e   w   e   b   m   a   s   t   e   r   h   e   l   p   .   c   o   m   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   e   l   e   m   e   n   t   s   /   d   e   s   _   r   2   _   c   8   .   g   i   f   "       w   i   d   t   h   =   "   7   2   "       h   e   i   g   h   t   =   "   3   2   "       a   l   t   =   "   I   m   a   g   e   s   "   &gt;   &lt;   /   a   &gt;   &lt;   /   t   d   &gt;   
                                           &lt;   t   d       w   i   d   t   h   =   "   7   2   "   &gt;   &lt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   f   r   e   e   w   e   b   m   a   s   t   e   r   h   e   l   p   .   c   o   m   /   d   i   r   e   c   t   o   r   y   "       o   n   M   o   u   s   e   O   u   t   =   "   M   M   _   s   w   a   p   I   m   g   R   e   s   t   o   r   e   (   )   "       o   n   M   o   u   s   e   O   v   e   r   =   "   M   M   _   s   w   a   p   I   m   a   g   e   (   '   I   m   a   g   e   6   '   ,   '   '   ,   '   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   f   r   e   e   w   e   b   m   a   s   t   e   r   h   e   l   p   .   c   o   m   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   e   l   e   m   e   n   t   s   /   d   e   s   2   _   r   2   _   c   9   .   g   i   f   '   ,   1   )   "   &gt;   &lt;   i   m   g       n   a   m   e   =   "   I   m   a   g   e   6   "       b   o   r   d   e   r   =   "   0   "       s   r   c   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   f   r   e   e   w   e   b   m   a   s   t   e   r   h   e   l   p   .   c   o   m   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   e   l   e   m   e   n   t   s   /   d   e   s   _   r   2   _   c   9   .   g   i   f   "       w   i   d   t   h   =   "   7   2   "       h   e   i   g   h   t   =   "   3   2   "       a   l   t   =   "   D   i   r   e   c   t   o   r   y   "   &gt;   &lt;   /   a   &gt;   &lt;   /   t   d   &gt;   
                                           &lt;   t   d       w   i   d   t   h   =   "   7   2   "   &gt;   &lt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   f   r   e   e   w   e   b   m   a   s   t   e   r   h   e   l   p   .   c   o   m   /   a   s   k   /   "       o   n   M   o   u   s   e   O   u   t   =   "   M   M   _   s   w   a   p   I   m   g   R   e   s   t   o   r   e   (   )   "       o   n   M   o   u   s   e   O   v   e   r   =   "   M   M   _   s   w   a   p   I   m   a   g   e   (   '   I   m   a   g   e   1   5   '   ,   '   '   ,   '   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   f   r   e   e   w   e   b   m   a   s   t   e   r   h   e   l   p   .   c   o   m   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   e   l   e   m   e   n   t   s   /   d   e   s   2   _   r   2   _   c   1   1   .   g   i   f   '   ,   1   )   "   &gt;   &lt;   i   m   g       n   a   m   e   =   "   I   m   a   g   e   1   5   "       b   o   r   d   e   r   =   "   0   "       s   r   c   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   f   r   e   e   w   e   b   m   a   s   t   e   r   h   e   l   p   .   c   o   m   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   e   l   e   m   e   n   t   s   /   d   e   s   _   r   2   _   c   1   1   .   g   i   f   "       w   i   d   t   h   =   "   7   2   "       h   e   i   g   h   t   =   "   3   2   "       a   l   t   =   "   A   s   k   "   &gt;   &lt;   /   a   &gt;   &lt;   /   t   d   &gt;   
                                           &lt;   t   d       w   i   d   t   h   =   "   7   2   "   &gt;   &lt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   f   r   e   e   w   e   b   m   a   s   t   e   r   h   e   l   p   .   c   o   m   /   n   e   w   s   l   e   t   t   e   r   .   p   h   p   "       o   n   M   o   u   s   e   O   u   t   =   "   M   M   _   s   w   a   p   I   m   g   R   e   s   t   o   r   e   (   )   "       o   n   M   o   u   s   e   O   v   e   r   =   "   M   M   _   s   w   a   p   I   m   a   g   e   (   '   I   m   a   g   e   1   6   '   ,   '   '   ,   '   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   f   r   e   e   w   e   b   m   a   s   t   e   r   h   e   l   p   .   c   o   m   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   e   l   e   m   e   n   t   s   /   d   e   s   2   _   r   2   _   c   1   2   .   g   i   f   '   ,   1   )   "   &gt;   &lt;   i   m   g       n   a   m   e   =   "   I   m   a   g   e   1   6   "       b   o   r   d   e   r   =   "   0   "       s   r   c   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   f   r   e   e   w   e   b   m   a   s   t   e   r   h   e   l   p   .   c   o   m   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   e   l   e   m   e   n   t   s   /   d   e   s   _   r   2   _   c   1   2   .   g   i   f   "       w   i   d   t   h   =   "   7   2   "       h   e   i   g   h   t   =   "   3   2   "       a   l   t   =   "   N   e   w   s   l   e   t   t   e   r   "   &gt;   &lt;   /   a   &gt;   &lt;   /   t   d   &gt;   
                                           &lt;   t   d       w   i   d   t   h   =   "   3   3   "   &gt;       &lt;   i   m   g       s   r   c   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   f   r   e   e   w   e   b   m   a   s   t   e   r   h   e   l   p   .   c   o   m   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   e   l   e   m   e   n   t   s   /   s   p   a   c   e   r   .   g   i   f   "       w   i   d   t   h   =   "   3   3   "       h   e   i   g   h   t   =   "   1   "   &gt;   &lt;   /   t   d   &gt;   
                                           &lt;   t   d       w   i   d   t   h   =   "   1   8   4   "   &gt;   
                                                   &lt;   d   i   v       a   l   i   g   n   =   "   r   i   g   h   t   "   &gt;   &lt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   g   o   w   a   n   s   n   e   t   .   c   o   m   "   &gt;   &lt;   i   m   g       s   r   c   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   f   r   e   e   w   e   b   m   a   s   t   e   r   h   e   l   p   .   c   o   m   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   e   l   e   m   e   n   t   s   /   d   e   s   _   r   2   _   c   1   4   .   g   i   f   "       w   i   d   t   h   =   "   1   8   4   "       h   e   i   g   h   t   =   "   3   2   "       b   o   r   d   e   r   =   "   0   "       a   l   t   =   "   P   a   r   t       o   f       G   o   w   a   n   s   n   e   t   "   &gt;   &lt;   /   a   &gt;   &lt;   /   d   i   v   &gt;   
                                           &lt;   /   t   d   &gt;   
                                   &lt;   /   t   r   &gt;   
                                   &lt;   t   r       h   e   i   g   h   t   =   "   1   0   "   &gt;   
                                           &lt;   t   d       c   o   l   s   p   a   n   =   "   9   "       h   e   i   g   h   t   =   "   1   0   "   &gt;   
                                                   &lt;   d   i   v       a   l   i   g   n   =   "   l   e   f   t   "   &gt;   &lt;   i   m   g       s   r   c   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   f   r   e   e   w   e   b   m   a   s   t   e   r   h   e   l   p   .   c   o   m   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   e   l   e   m   e   n   t   s   /   d   e   s   _   r   3   _   c   2   .   g   i   f   "       w   i   d   t   h   =   "   7   1   5   "       h   e   i   g   h   t   =   "   1   0   "       a   l   t   =   "   *   "   &gt;   &lt;   /   d   i   v   &gt;   
                                           &lt;   /   t   d   &gt;   
                                   &lt;   /   t   r   &gt;   
                           &lt;   /   t   a   b   l   e   &gt;   
                   &lt;   /   t   d   &gt;   
           &lt;   /   t   r   &gt;   
           &lt;   t   r   &gt;   
                   &lt;   t   d   &gt;   
   
                   &lt;   !   -   -       M   a   i   n       T   a   b   l   e       -   -   &gt;   
                           &lt;   t   a   b   l   e       w   i   d   t   h   =   "   7   3   0   "       b   o   r   d   e   r   =   "   0   "       c   e   l   l   s   p   a   c   i   n   g   =   "   0   "       c   e   l   l   p   a   d   d   i   n   g   =   "   0   "   &gt;   
                                   &lt;   t   r   &gt;   
                                           &lt;   t   d       w   i   d   t   h   =   "   9   "   &gt;   &amp;   n   b   s   p   ;   &lt;   /   t   d   &gt;   
   
                                           &lt;   !   -   -       S   i   d   e       B   a   r       -   -   &gt;   
                                           &lt;   t   d       w   i   d   t   h   =   "   1   0   6   "       v   a   l   i   g   n   =   "   t   o   p   "   &gt;       &lt;   f   o   n   t       f   a   c   e   =   "   V   e   r   d   a   n   a   ,       A   r   i   a   l   ,       H   e   l   v   e   t   i   c   a   ,       s   a   n   s   -   s   e   r   i   f   "       s   i   z   e   =   "   1   "   &gt;   
   	   	           &lt;   f   o   r   m       n   a   m   e   =   "   f   o   r   m   1   "       m   e   t   h   o   d   =   "   g   e   t   "       a   c   t   i   o   n   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   f   r   e   e   w   e   b   m   a   s   t   e   r   h   e   l   p   .   c   o   m   /   s   e   a   r   c   h   .   p   h   p   "   &gt;   
                                                           &lt;   i   n   p   u   t       t   y   p   e   =   "   t   e   x   t   "       n   a   m   e   =   "   q   u   e   r   y   "       v   a   l   u   e   =   "   S   e   a   r   c   h       S   i   t   e   "       s   i   z   e   =   "   1   3   "   &gt;   &lt;   b   r   &gt;   
                                                           &lt;   i   n   p   u   t       t   y   p   e   =   "   i   m   a   g   e   "       b   o   r   d   e   r   =   "   0   "       n   a   m   e   =   "   i   m   a   g   e   F   i   e   l   d   "       s   r   c   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   f   r   e   e   w   e   b   m   a   s   t   e   r   h   e   l   p   .   c   o   m   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   e   l   e   m   e   n   t   s   /   d   e   s   2   _   r   1   0   _   c   3   .   g   i   f   "       w   i   d   t   h   =   "   5   4   "       h   e   i   g   h   t   =   "   1   7   "       a   l   t   =   "   S   e   a   r   c   h   "   &gt;   
                                                   &lt;   /   f   o   r   m   &gt;   
                                                   &lt;   /   f   o   n   t   &gt;   
   
   	   	   	   &lt;   !   -   -       L   i   n   k   s       B   a   r       -   -   &gt;   
   	   	   	   &lt;   p       a   l   i   g   n   =   "   c   e   n   t   e   r   "   &gt;   
   	   	   	   &lt;   t   a   b   l   e       w   i   d   t   h   =   "   1   0   6   "       b   o   r   d   e   r   =   "   0   "       c   e   l   l   s   p   a   c   i   n   g   =   "   0   "       c   e   l   l   p   a   d   d   i   n   g   =   "   0   "       a   l   i   g   n   =   "   c   e   n   t   e   r   "   &gt;   
                                                           &lt;   t   r   &gt;   
                                                                   &lt;   t   d   &gt;   &lt;   i   m   g       s   r   c   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   f   r   e   e   w   e   b   m   a   s   t   e   r   h   e   l   p   .   c   o   m   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   e   l   e   m   e   n   t   s   /   d   e   s   _   r   5   _   c   2   .   g   i   f   "       w   i   d   t   h   =   "   1   0   6   "       h   e   i   g   h   t   =   "   1   8   "       a   l   t   =   "   T   u   t   o   r   i   a   l   s   "   &gt;   &lt;   /   t   d   &gt;   
                                                           &lt;   /   t   r   &gt;   
                                                           &lt;   t   r   &gt;   
                                                                   &lt;   t   d       b   a   c   k   g   r   o   u   n   d   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   f   r   e   e   w   e   b   m   a   s   t   e   r   h   e   l   p   .   c   o   m   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   e   l   e   m   e   n   t   s   /   d   e   s   _   r   7   _   c   2   .   g   i   f   "   &gt;   
                                                                           &lt;   t   a   b   l   e       w   i   d   t   h   =   "   1   0   6   "       b   o   r   d   e   r   =   "   0   "       c   e   l   l   s   p   a   c   i   n   g   =   "   2   "       c   e   l   l   p   a   d   d   i   n   g   =   "   2   "   &gt;   
                                                                           &lt;   t   r   &gt;   &lt;   t   d   &gt;   &lt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   f   r   e   e   w   e   b   m   a   s   t   e   r   h   e   l   p   .   c   o   m   /   t   u   t   o   r   i   a   l   s   /   c   o   o   k   i   e   s   "   &gt;   &lt;   f   o   n   t       f   a   c   e   =   "   V   e   r   d   a   n   a   ,       A   r   i   a   l   ,       H   e   l   v   e   t   i   c   a   ,       s   a   n   s   -   s   e   r   i   f   "       s   i   z   e   =   "   1   "   &gt;   C   o   o   k   i   e   s   &lt;   /   f   o   n   t   &gt;   &lt;   /   a   &gt;   &lt;   /   t   d   &gt;   &lt;   /   t   r   &gt;   &lt;   t   r   &gt;   &lt;   t   d   &gt;   &lt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   f   r   e   e   w   e   b   m   a   s   t   e   r   h   e   l   p   .   c   o   m   /   t   u   t   o   r   i   a   l   s   /   a   s   p   "   &gt;   &lt;   f   o   n   t       f   a   c   e   =   "   V   e   r   d   a   n   a   ,       A   r   i   a   l   ,       H   e   l   v   e   t   i   c   a   ,       s   a   n   s   -   s   e   r   i   f   "       s   i   z   e   =   "   1   "   &gt;   A   S   P   &lt;   /   f   o   n   t   &gt;   &lt;   /   a   &gt;   &lt;   /   t   d   &gt;   &lt;   /   t   r   &gt;   &lt;   t   r   &gt;   &lt;   t   d   &gt;   &lt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   f   r   e   e   w   e   b   m   a   s   t   e   r   h   e   l   p   .   c   o   m   /   t   u   t   o   r   i   a   l   s   /   h   t   m   l   -   a   d   v   a   n   c   e   d   "   &gt;   &lt;   f   o   n   t       f   a   c   e   =   "   V   e   r   d   a   n   a   ,       A   r   i   a   l   ,       H   e   l   v   e   t   i   c   a   ,       s   a   n   s   -   s   e   r   i   f   "       s   i   z   e   =   "   1   "   &gt;   A   d   v   a   n   c   e   d       H   T   M   L   &lt;   /   f   o   n   t   &gt;   &lt;   /   a   &gt;   &lt;   /   t   d   &gt;   &lt;   /   t   r   &gt;   &lt;   t   r   &gt;   &lt;   t   d   &gt;   &lt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   f   r   e   e   w   e   b   m   a   s   t   e   r   h   e   l   p   .   c   o   m   /   t   u   t   o   r   i   a   l   s   /   f   r   a   m   e   s   t   a   b   l   e   s   "   &gt;   &lt;   f   o   n   t       f   a   c   e   =   "   V   e   r   d   a   n   a   ,       A   r   i   a   l   ,       H   e   l   v   e   t   i   c   a   ,       s   a   n   s   -   s   e   r   i   f   "       s   i   z   e   =   "   1   "   &gt;   F   r   a   m   e   s       &amp;       T   a   b   l   e   s   &lt;   /   f   o   n   t   &gt;   &lt;   /   a   &gt;   &lt;   /   t   d   &gt;   &lt;   /   t   r   &gt;   &lt;   t   r   &gt;   &lt;   t   d   &gt;   &lt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   f   r   e   e   w   e   b   m   a   s   t   e   r   h   e   l   p   .   c   o   m   /   t   u   t   o   r   i   a   l   s   /   h   t   a   c   c   e   s   s   "   &gt;   &lt;   f   o   n   t       f   a   c   e   =   "   V   e   r   d   a   n   a   ,       A   r   i   a   l   ,       H   e   l   v   e   t   i   c   a   ,       s   a   n   s   -   s   e   r   i   f   "       s   i   z   e   =   "   1   "   &gt;   .   h   t   a   c   c   e   s   s   &lt;   /   f   o   n   t   &gt;   &lt;   /   a   &gt;   &lt;   /   t   d   &gt;   &lt;   /   t   r   &gt;   &lt;   t   r   &gt;   &lt;   t   d   &gt;   &lt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   f   r   e   e   w   e   b   m   a   s   t   e   r   h   e   l   p   .   c   o   m   /   t   u   t   o   r   i   a   l   s   /   c   o   r   n   e   r   s   "   &gt;   &lt;   f   o   n   t       f   a   c   e   =   "   V   e   r   d   a   n   a   ,       A   r   i   a   l   ,       H   e   l   v   e   t   i   c   a   ,       s   a   n   s   -   s   e   r   i   f   "       s   i   z   e   =   "   1   "   &gt;   R   o   u   n   d   e   d       T   a   b   l   e       C   o   r   n   e   r   s   &lt;   /   f   o   n   t   &gt;   &lt;   /   a   &gt;   &lt;   /   t   d   &gt;   &lt;   /   t   r   &gt;   &lt;   t   r   &gt;   F   l   a   s   h       5   &lt;   /   f   o   n   t   &gt;   &lt;   /   a   &gt;   &lt;   /   t   d   &gt;   &lt;   /   t   r   &gt;   &lt;   t   r   &gt;   &lt;   t   d   &gt;   &lt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   f   r   e   e   w   e   b   m   a   s   t   e   r   h   e   l   p   .   c   o   m   /   t   u   t   o   r   i   a   l   s   /   f   t   p   "   &gt;   P   H   P   /   M   y   S   Q   L   &lt;   /   f   o   n   t   &gt;   &lt;   /   a   &gt;   &lt;   /   t   d   &gt;   &lt;   /   t   r   &gt;   &lt;   t   r   &gt;   &lt;   t   d   &gt;   &lt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   f   r   e   e   w   e   b   m   a   s   t   e   r   h   e   l   p   .   c   o   m   /   t   u   t   o   r   i   a   l   s   /   p   r   o   m   o   t   e   "   &gt;   S   i   t   e       P   r   o   m   o   t   i   o   n   &lt;   /   f   o   n   t   &gt;   &lt;   /   a   &gt;   &lt;   /   t   d   &gt;   &lt;   /   t   r   &gt;   &lt;   t   r   &gt;   &lt;   t   d   &gt;   &lt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   f   r   e   e   w   e   b   m   a   s   t   e   r   h   e   l   p   .   c   o   m   /   t   u   t   o   r   i   a   l   s   /   w   m   l   "   &gt;   &lt;   f   o   n   t       f   a   c   e   =   "   V   e   r   d   a   n   a   ,       A   r   i   a   l   ,       H   e   l   v   e   t   i   c   a   ,       s   a   n   s   -   s   e   r   i   f   "       s   i   z   e   =   "   1   "   &gt;   M   o   b   i   l   e       I   n   t   e   r   n   e   t   :       W   M   L   /   W   A   P   &lt;   /   f   o   n   t   &gt;   &lt;   /   a   &gt;   &lt;   /   t   d   &gt;   &lt;   /   t   r   &gt;   &lt;   t   r   &gt;   &lt;   t   d   &gt;   &lt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   f   r   e   e   w   e   b   m   a   s   t   e   r   h   e   l   p   .   c   o   m   /   t   u   t   o   r   i   a   l   s   /   s   s   i   "   &gt;   &lt;   f   o   n   t       f   a   c   e   =   "   V   e   r   d   a   n   a   ,       A   r   i   a   l   ,       H   e   l   v   e   t   i   c   a   ,       s   a   n   s   -   s   e   r   i   f   "       s   i   z   e   =   "   1   "   &gt;   S   e   r   v   e   r       S   i   d   e       I   n   c   l   u   d   e   s       (   S   S   I   )   &lt;   /   f   o   n   t   &gt;   &lt;   /   a   &gt;   &lt;   /   t   d   &gt;   &lt;   /   t   r   &gt;   &lt;   t   r   &gt;   &lt;   t   d   &gt;   &lt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   f   r   e   e   w   e   b   m   a   s   t   e   r   h   e   l   p   .   c   o   m   /   t   u   t   o   r   i   a   l   s   /   h   t   m   l   -   b   a   s   i   c   s   "   &gt;   &lt;   f   o   n   t       f   a   c   e   =   "   V   e   r   d   a   n   a   ,       A   r   i   a   l   ,       H   e   l   v   e   t   i   c   a   ,       s   a   n   s   -   s   e   r   i   f   "       s   i   z   e   =   "   1   "   &gt;   H   T   M   L       -       T   h   e       B   a   s   i   c   s   &lt;   /   f   o   n   t   &gt;   &lt;   /   a   &gt;   &lt;   /   t   d   &gt;   &lt;   /   t   r   &gt;   &lt;   t   r   &gt;   &lt;   &lt;   f   o   n   t       f   a   c   e   =   "   V   e   r   d   a   n   a   ,       A   r   i   a   l   ,       H   e   l   v   e   t   i   c   a   ,       s   a   n   s   -   s   e   r   i   f   "       s   i   z   e   =   "   1   "   &gt;   X   H   T   M   L   &lt;   /   f   o   n   t   &gt;   &lt;   /   a   &gt;   &lt;   /   t   d   &gt;   &lt;   /   t   r   &gt;   &lt;   t   r   &gt;   &lt;   t   d   &gt;   &lt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   f   r   e   e   w   e   b   m   a   s   t   e   r   h   e   l   p   .   c   o   m   /   t   u   t   o   r   i   a   l   s   /   s   t   y   l   e   s   h   e   e   t   s   "   &gt;   &lt;   f   o   n   t       f   a   c   e   =   "   V   e   r   d   a   n   a   ,       A   r   i   a   l   ,       H   e   l   v   e   t   i   c   a   ,       s   a   n   s   -   s   e   r   i   f   "       s   i   z   e   =   "   1   "   &gt;   S   t   y   l   e   s   h   e   e   t   s   &lt;   /   f   o   n   t   &gt;   &lt;   /   a   &gt;   &lt;   /   t   d   &gt;   &lt;   /   t   r   &gt;   &lt;   t   r   &gt;   &lt;   t   d   &gt;   &lt;   &lt;   f   o   n   t       f   a   c   e   =   "   V   e   r   d   a   n   a   ,       A   r   i   a   l   ,       H   e   l   v   e   t   i   c   a   ,       s   a   n   s   -   s   e   r   i   f   "       s   i   z   e   =   "   1   "   &gt;   X   M   L   &lt;   /   f   o   n   t   &gt;   &lt;   /   a   &gt;   &lt;   /   t   d   &gt;   &lt;   /   t   r   &gt;   &lt;   t   r   &gt;   &lt;   t   d   &gt;   &lt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   f   r   e   e   w   e   b   m   a   s   t   e   r   h   e   l   p   .   c   o   m   /   t   u   t   o   r   i   a   l   s   /   p   h   p   "   &gt;   &lt;   f   o   n   t       f   a   c   e   =   "   V   e   r   d   a   n   a   ,       A   r   i   a   l   ,       H   e   l   v   e   t   i   c   a   ,       s   a   n   s   -   s   e   r   i   f   "       s   i   z   e   =   "   1   "   &gt;   P   H   P   &lt;   /   f   o   n   t   &gt;   &lt;   /   a   &gt;   &lt;   /   t   d   &gt;   &lt;   /   t   r   &gt;   &lt;   /   t   d   &gt;   &lt;   /   t   a   b   l   e   &gt;   
   
                                                                   &lt;   /   t   d   &gt;   
                                                           &lt;   /   t   r   &gt;

                                                                   &lt;   t   d   &gt;   &lt;   i   m   g       s   r   c   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   f   r   e   e   w   e   b   m   a   s   t   e   r   h   e   l   p   .   c   o   m   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   e   l   e   m   e   n   t   s   /   d   e   s   _   r   8   _   c   2   .   g   i   f   "       w   i   d   t   h   =   "   1   0   6   "       h   e   i   g   h   t   =   "   1   4   "       a   l   t   =   "   *   "   &gt;   &lt;   /   t   d   &gt;   
                                                           &lt;   /   t   r   &gt;   
                                                   &lt;   /   t   a   b   l   e   &gt;   
                                                   &lt;   /   p   &gt;   
   &lt;   p       a   l   i   g   n   =   "   c   e   n   t   e   r   "   &gt;   
   &lt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   s   i   t   e   5   .   c   o   m   /   i   n   .   p   h   p   ?   i   d   =   1   9   1   0   6   -   4   2   "   &gt;   &lt;   i   m   g       a   l   t   =   "   1   2   5   x   1   2   5   "       b   o   r   d   e   r   =   "   0   "       s   r   c   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   s   i   t   e   5   .   c   o   m   /   c   r   e   a   t   i   v   e   /   2   0   0   8   /   4   /   1   2   5   x   1   2   5   .   g   i   f   "       /   &gt;   &lt;   /   a   &gt;   	           &lt;   /   p   &gt;   
   
   	   	   	   &lt;   !   -   -       R   e   l   a   t   e   d       L   i   n   k   s       -   -   &gt;   
                                               &lt;   a       n   a   m   e   =   "   r   e   l   a   t   e   d   "   &gt;   &lt;   /   a   &gt;   
                                               &lt;   p       a   l   i   g   n   =   "   c   e   n   t   e   r   "   &gt;   
                                                   &lt;   t   a   b   l   e       w   i   d   t   h   =   "   1   0   6   "       b   o   r   d   e   r   =   "   0   "       c   e   l   l   s   p   a   c   i   n   g   =   "   0   "       c   e   l   l   p   a   d   d   i   n   g   =   "   0   "       a   l   i   g   n   =   "   c   e   n   t   e   r   "   &gt;   
                                                           &lt;   t   r   &gt;   
                                                                   &lt;   t   d   &gt;   &lt;   i   m   g       s   r   c   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   f   r   e   e   w   e   b   m   a   s   t   e   r   h   e   l   p   .   c   o   m   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   e   l   e   m   e   n   t   s   /   d   e   s   2   _   r   5   _   c   2   .   g   i   f   "       w   i   d   t   h   =   "   1   0   6   "       h   e   i   g   h   t   =   "   1   8   "       a   l   t   =   "   R   e   l   a   t   e   d       L   i   n   k   s   "   &gt;   &lt;   /   t   d   &gt;   
                                                           &lt;   /   t   r   &gt;   
                                                           &lt;   t   r   &gt;   
                                                                   &lt;   t   d       b   a   c   k   g   r   o   u   n   d   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   f   r   e   e   w   e   b   m   a   s   t   e   r   h   e   l   p   .   c   o   m   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   e   l   e   m   e   n   t   s   /   d   e   s   _   r   7   _   c   2   .   g   i   f   "   &gt;   
                                                                           &lt;   t   a   b   l   e       w   i   d   t   h   =   "   1   0   6   "       b   o   r   d   e   r   =   "   0   "       c   e   l   l   s   p   a   c   i   n   g   =   "   2   "       c   e   l   l   p   a   d   d   i   n   g   =   "   2   "   &gt;   
                                                                           &lt;   t   r   &gt;   &lt;   t   d   &gt;   &lt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   "   
   	   	   	   	   	   	   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   f   r   e   e   w   e   b   m   a   s   t   e   r   h   e   l   p   .   c   o   m   /   t   u   t   o   r   i   a   l   s   /   p   h   p   /   "   &gt;   &lt;   f   o   n   t       f   a   c   e   =   "   V   e   r   d   a   n   a   ,       A   r   i   a   l   ,       H   e   l   v   e   t   i   c   a   ,       s   a   n   s   -   s   e   r   i   f   "       s   i   z   e   =   "   1   "   &gt;   P   H   P       T   u   t   o   r   i   a   l   &lt;   /   f   o   n   t   &gt;   &lt;   /   a   &gt;   &lt;   /   t   d   &gt;   &lt;   /   t   r   &gt;   &lt;   t   r   &gt;   &lt;   t   d   &gt;   &lt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   "   
   	   	   	   	   	   	   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   p   h   p   .   n   e   t   "   &gt;   &lt;   f   o   n   t       f   a   c   e   =   "   V   e   r   d   a   n   a   ,       A   r   i   a   l   ,       H   e   l   v   e   t   i   c   a   ,       s   a   n   s   -   s   e   r   i   f   "       s   i   z   e   =   "   1   "   &gt;   O   f   f   i   c   i   a   l       P   H   P       H   o   m   e   p   a   g   e   &lt;   /   f   o   n   t   &gt;   &lt;   /   a   &gt;   &lt;   /   t   d   &gt;   &lt;   /   t   r   &gt;   &lt;   t   r   &gt;   &lt;   t   d   &gt;   &lt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   "   
   	   	   	   	   	   	   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   m   y   s   q   l   .   c   o   m   "   &gt;   &lt;   f   o   n   t       f   a   c   e   =   "   V   e   r   d   a   n   a   ,       A   r   i   a   l   ,       H   e   l   v   e   t   i   c   a   ,       s   a   n   s   -   s   e   r   i   f   "       s   i   z   e   =   "   1   "   &gt;   O   f   f   i   c   i   a   l       M   y   S   Q   L       H   o   m   e   p   a   g   e   &lt;   /   f   o   n   t   &gt;   &lt;   /   a   &gt;   &lt;   /   t   d   &gt;   &lt;   /   t   r   &gt;   &lt;   t   r   &gt;   &lt;   t   d   &gt;   &lt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   "   
   	   	   	   	   	   	   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   f   r   e   e   w   e   b   m   a   s   t   e   r   h   e   l   p   .   c   o   m   /   s   t   a   t   i   c   /   t   u   t   o   r   i   a   l   s   /   p   h   p   m   y   s   q   l   /   e   x   a   m   p   l   e   .   z   i   p   "   &gt;   &lt;   f   o   n   t       f   a   c   e   =   "   V   e   r   d   a   n   a   ,       A   r   i   a   l   ,       H   e   l   v   e   t   i   c   a   ,       s   a   n   s   -   s   e   r   i   f   "       s   i   z   e   =   "   1   "   &gt;   F   u   l   l       C   o   d   e       O   f       E   x   a   m   p   l   e   &lt;   /   f   o   n   t   &gt;   &lt;   /   a   &gt;   &lt;   /   t   d   &gt;   &lt;   /   t   r   &gt;   &lt;   t   r   &gt;   &lt;   t   d   &gt;   &lt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   "   
   	   	   	   	   	   	   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   p   h   p   b   u   i   l   d   e   r   .   c   o   m   "   &gt;   &lt;   f   o   n   t       f   a   c   e   =   "   V   e   r   d   a   n   a   ,       A   r   i   a   l   ,       H   e   l   v   e   t   i   c   a   ,       s   a   n   s   -   s   e   r   i   f   "       s   i   z   e   =   "   1   "   &gt;   P   H   P       B   u   i   l   d   e   r   &lt;   /   f   o   n   t   &gt;   &lt;   /   a   &gt;   &lt;   /   t   d   &gt;   &lt;   /   t   r   &gt;   &lt;   t   r   &gt;   &lt;   t   d   &gt;   &lt;   f   o   n   t       f   a   c   e   =   "   V   e   r   d   a   n   a   ,       A   r   i   a   l   ,       H   e   l   v   e   t   i   c   a   ,       s   a   n   s   -   s   e   r   i   f   "       s   i   z   e   =   "   1   "   &gt;   &lt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   g   o   o   g   l   e   .   c   o   m   /   s   e   a   r   c   h   ?   h   l   =   e   n   &amp;   q   =   p   h   p       m   y   s   q   l   "   &gt;   M   o   r   e       P   H   P   /   M   y   S   Q   L       S   i   t   e   s   &lt;   /   a   &gt;   &lt;   /   f   o   n   t   &gt;   &lt;   /   t   d   &gt;   &lt;   /   t   r   &gt;                                                                           &lt;   /   t   a   b   l   e   &gt;   
                                                                   &lt;   /   t   d   &gt;   
                                                           &lt;   /   t   r   &gt;   
                                                           &lt;   t   r   &gt;   
                                                                   &lt;   t   d   &gt;   &lt;   i   m   g       s   r   c   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   f   r   e   e   w   e   b   m   a   s   t   e   r   h   e   l   p   .   c   o   m   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   e   l   e   m   e   n   t   s   /   d   e   s   _   r   8   _   c   2   .   g   i   f   "       w   i   d   t   h   =   "   1   0   6   "       h   e   i   g   h   t   =   "   1   4   "       a   l   t   =   "   *   "   &gt;   &lt;   /   t   d   &gt;   
                                                           &lt;   /   t   r   &gt;   
                                                   &lt;   /   t   a   b   l   e   &gt;   
                                                   &lt;   /   p   &gt;   
   &lt;   /   t   d   &gt;   
                                           &lt;   t   d       w   i   d   t   h   =   "   9   "   &gt;   &amp;   n   b   s   p   ;   &lt;   /   t   d   &gt;   
   
                                           &lt;   !   -   -       M   a   i   n       T   a   b   l   e       C   e   l   l       -   -   &gt;   
                                           &lt;   t   d       v   a   l   i   g   n   =   "   t   o   p   "   &gt;   
                                                   &lt;   t   a   b   l   e       w   i   d   t   h   =   "   1   0   0   %   "       b   o   r   d   e   r   =   "   0   "       c   e   l   l   s   p   a   c   i   n   g   =   "   0   "       c   e   l   l   p   a   d   d   i   n   g   =   "   0   "   &gt;   
                                                           &lt;   t   r   &gt;   
   
                                                           	   &lt;   !   -   -       L   i   n   k   s       A   t       T   o   p       O   f       P   a   g   e       -   -   &gt;   
                                                                   &lt;   t   d   &gt;   &lt;   f   o   n   t       f   a   c   e   =   "   V   e   r   d   a   n   a   ,       A   r   i   a   l   ,       H   e   l   v   e   t   i   c   a   ,       s   a   n   s   -   s   e   r   i   f   "       s   i   z   e   =   "   1   "   &gt;   &lt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   f   r   e   e   w   e   b   m   a   s   t   e   r   h   e   l   p   .   c   o   m   /   s   i   t   e   m   a   p   .   p   h   p   "   &gt;   S   i   t   e   m   a   p   &lt;   /   a   &gt;   
                                                                           |       &lt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   f   r   e   e   w   e   b   m   a   s   t   e   r   h   e   l   p   .   c   o   m   /   c   o   n   t   a   c   t   .   p   h   p   "   &gt;   C   o   n   t   a   c   t   &lt;   /   a   &gt;   
                                                                           |       &lt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   f   r   e   e   w   e   b   m   a   s   t   e   r   h   e   l   p   .   c   o   m   /   l   i   n   k   .   p   h   p   ?   p   t   y   p   e   =   t   a   &amp;   p   i   d   =   7   1   "   &gt;   L   i   n   k       T   o       U   s   &lt;   /   a   &gt;   
                                                                           |       &lt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   g   o   w   a   n   s   n   e   t   .   c   o   m   /   a   d   v   e   r   t   i   s   i   n   g   .   p   h   p   "   &gt;   A   d   v   e   r   t   i   s   e   &lt;   /   a   &gt;   &lt;   b   r   &gt;   
                                                                           &lt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   f   r   e   e   w   e   b   m   a   s   t   e   r   h   e   l   p   .   c   o   m   /   p   r   o   b   l   e   m   .   p   h   p   ?   p   i   d   =   "   &gt;   R   e   p   o   r   t   
                                                                           A       P   r   o   b   l   e   m   &lt;   /   a   &gt;       &lt;   /   f   o   n   t   &gt;   &lt;   /   t   d   &gt;   
                                                                   &lt;   t   d   &gt;   
   
                                                                   	   &lt;   !   -   -       B   r   e   a   d   c   r   u   m   b       T   r   a   i   l       -   -   &gt;   
                                                                           &lt;   d   i   v       a   l   i   g   n   =   "   r   i   g   h   t   "   &gt;   &lt;   f   o   n   t       f   a   c   e   =   "   V   e   r   d   a   n   a   ,       A   r   i   a   l   ,       H   e   l   v   e   t   i   c   a   ,       s   a   n   s   -   s   e   r   i   f   "       s   i   z   e   =   "   1   "   &gt;   &lt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   f   r   e   e   w   e   b   m   a   s   t   e   r   h   e   l   p   .   c   o   m   /   "   &gt;   H   o   m   e   &lt;   /   a   &gt;       :       &lt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   f   r   e   e   w   e   b   m   a   s   t   e   r   h   e   l   p   .   c   o   m   /   t   u   t   o   r   i   a   l   s   /   "   &gt;   T   u   t   o   r   i   a   l   s   &lt;   /   a   &gt;       :       &lt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   f   r   e   e   w   e   b   m   a   s   t   e   r   h   e   l   p   .   c   o   m   /   t   u   t   o   r   i   a   l   s   /   p   h   p   m   y   s   q   l   /   "   &gt;   P   H   P   /   M   y   S   Q   L   &lt;   /   a   &gt;       :       P   a   r   t       4   &lt;   /   f   o   n   t   &gt;   &lt;   /   d   i   v   &gt;   
                                                                   &lt;   /   t   d   &gt;   
                                                           &lt;   /   t   r   &gt;   
                                                   &lt;   /   t   a   b   l   e   &gt;   
   
                                                   	   	   	   &lt;   !   -   -       P   a   g   e       T   i   t   l   e       -   -   &gt;   
                                                                                               &lt;   p       a   l   i   g   n   =   "   c   e   n   t   e   r   "   &gt;   &lt;   f   o   n   t       f   a   c   e   =   "   A   r   i   a   l   ,       H   e   l   v   e   t   i   c   a   ,       s   a   n   s   -   s   e   r   i   f   "       s   i   z   e   =   "   5   "   &gt;   &lt;   b   &gt;   &lt;   f   o   n   t       c   o   l   o   r   =   "   #   0   0   0   0   9   9   "       s   i   z   e   =   "   6   "   &gt;   
                                                                                               P   H   P   /   M   y   S   Q   L       T   u   t   o   r   i   a   l   &lt;   b   r   &gt;   
                                                           &lt;   f   o   n   t       s   i   z   e   =   "   4   "       c   o   l   o   r   =   "   #   0   0   0   0   0   0   "   &gt;   P   a   r   t       4       -       D   i   s   p   l   a   y   i   n   g       D   a   t   a   &lt;   /   f   o   n   t   &gt;   &lt;   /   f   o   n   t   &gt;   &lt;   /   b   &gt;   &lt;   /   f   o   n   t   &gt;   &lt;   /   p   &gt;   
   
                                                           &lt;   !   -   -       L   i   n   k   s       T   o       O   t   h   e   r       T   u   t   o   r   i   a   l       P   a   r   t   s       -   -   &gt;   
                                                           &lt;   f   o   n   t       f   a   c   e   =   "   A   r   i   a   l   ,       H   e   l   v   e   t   i   c   a   ,       s   a   n   s   -   s   e   r   i   f   "       s   i   z   e   =   "   2   "   &gt;   &lt;   u   l   &gt;   &lt;   l   i   &gt;   &lt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   f   r   e   e   w   e   b   m   a   s   t   e   r   h   e   l   p   .   c   o   m   /   t   u   t   o   r   i   a   l   s   /   p   h   p   m   y   s   q   l   /   1   "   &gt;   P   a   r   t       1       -       I   n   t   r   o   d   u   c   t   i   o   n   &lt;   /   a   &gt;   &lt;   /   l   i   &gt;   &lt;   l   i   &gt;   &lt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   f   r   e   e   w   e   b   m   a   s   t   e   r   h   e   l   p   .   c   o   m   /   t   u   t   o   r   i   a   l   s   /   p   h   p   m   y   s   q   l   /   2   "   &gt;   P   a   r   t       2       -       S   e   t   t   i   n   g       U   p       T   h   e       D   a   t   a   b   a   s   e   &lt;   /   a   &gt;   &lt;   /   l   i   &gt;   &lt;   l   i   &gt;   &lt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   f   r   e   e   w   e   b   m   a   s   t   e   r   h   e   l   p   .   c   o   m   /   t   u   t   o   r   i   a   l   s   /   p   h   p   m   y   s   q   l   /   3   "   &gt;   P   a   r   t       3       -       I   n   s   e   r   t   i   n   g       I   n   f   o   r   m   a   t   i   o   n   &lt;   /   a   &gt;   &lt;   /   l   i   &gt;   &lt;   l   i   &gt;   &lt;   b   &gt;   P   a   r   t       4       -       D   i   s   p   l   a   y   i   n   g       D   a   t   a   &lt;   /   b   &gt;   &lt;   /   l   i   &gt;   &lt;   l   i   &gt;   &lt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   f   r   e   e   w   e   b   m   a   s   t   e   r   h   e   l   p   .   c   o   m   /   t   u   t   o   r   i   a   l   s   /   p   h   p   m   y   s   q   l   /   5   "   &gt;   P   a   r   t       5       -       M   o   r   e       O   u   t   p   u   t   s   &lt;   /   a   &gt;   &lt;   /   l   i   &gt;   &lt;   l   i   &gt;   &lt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   f   r   e   e   w   e   b   m   a   s   t   e   r   h   e   l   p   .   c   o   m   /   t   u   t   o   r   i   a   l   s   /   p   h   p   m   y   s   q   l   /   6   "   &gt;   P   a   r   t       6       -       S   i   n   g   l   e       R   e   c   o   r   d   s       &amp;       E   r   r   o   r       T   r   a   p   p   i   n   g   &lt;   /   a   &gt;   &lt;   /   l   i   &gt;   &lt;   l   i   &gt;   &lt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   f   r   e   e   w   e   b   m   a   s   t   e   r   h   e   l   p   .   c   o   m   /   t   u   t   o   r   i   a   l   s   /   p   h   p   m   y   s   q   l   /   7   "   &gt;   P   a   r   t       7       -       U   p   d   a   t   i   n   g       &amp;       D   e   l   e   t   i   n   g   &lt;   /   a   &gt;   &lt;   /   l   i   &gt;   &lt;   l   i   &gt;   &lt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   f   r   e   e   w   e   b   m   a   s   t   e   r   h   e   l   p   .   c   o   m   /   t   u   t   o   r   i   a   l   s   /   p   h   p   m   y   s   q   l   /   8   "   &gt;   P   a   r   t       8       -       F   i   n   i   s   h   i   n   g       T   h   e       S   c   r   i   p   t   &lt;   /   a   &gt;   &lt;   /   l   i   &gt;   &lt;   /   u   l   &gt;   &lt;   /   f   o   n   t   &gt;   
   
                                                           &lt;   !   -   -       P   a   g   e       C   o   n   t   e   n   t       -   -   &gt;   
                                                           &lt;   p   &gt;   &lt;   f   o   n   t       f   a   c   e   =   "   A   r   i   a   l   ,       H   e   l   v   e   t   i   c   a   ,       s   a   n   s   -   s   e   r   i   f   "       s   i   z   e   =   "   2   "   &gt;   
                                                           &lt;   d   i   v       a   l   i   g   n   =   "   r   i   g   h   t   "       s   t   y   l   e   =   "   f   l   o   a   t   :   r   i   g   h   t   "   &gt;   
   &lt;   i   f   r   a   m   e       s   r   c   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   r   c   m   .   a   m   a   z   o   n   .   c   o   m   /   e   /   c   m   ?   t   =   f   r   e   e   w   e   b   m   a   s   t   e   r   -   2   0   &amp;   o   =   1   &amp;   p   =   1   4   &amp;   l   =   s   t   1   &amp;   m   o   d   e   =   b   o   o   k   s   &amp;   s   e   a   r   c   h   =   p   h   p       m   y   s   q   l   &amp;   f   c   1   =   0   0   0   0   0   0   &amp;   l   t   1   =   &amp;   l   c   1   =   3   3   6   6   F   F   &amp;   b   g   1   =   F   F   F   F   F   F   &amp;   f   =   i   f   r   "       m   a   r   g   i   n   w   i   d   t   h   =   "   0   "       m   a   r   g   i   n   h   e   i   g   h   t   =   "   0   "       w   i   d   t   h   =   "   1   6   0   "       h   e   i   g   h   t   =   "   6   0   0   "       b   o   r   d   e   r   =   "   0   "       f   r   a   m   e   b   o   r   d   e   r   =   "   0   "       s   t   y   l   e   =   "   b   o   r   d   e   r   :   n   o   n   e   ;   "       s   c   r   o   l   l   i   n   g   =   "   n   o   "   &gt;   &lt;   /   i   f   r   a   m   e   &gt;   
   &lt;   /   d   i   v   &gt;   &lt;   f   o   n   t       f   a   c   e   =   "   A   r   i   a   l   "       c   o   l   o   r   =   "   #   0   0   0   0   9   9   "   &gt;   &lt;   b   i   g   &gt;   &lt;   b   &gt;   I   n   t   r   o   d   u   c   t   i   o   n   &lt;   /   b   &gt;   &lt;   /   b   i   g   &gt;   &lt;   /   f   o   n   t   &gt;   &lt;   b   r       /   &gt;      
   &lt;   b   r       /   &gt;      
   S   o       f   a   r       i   n       t   h   i   s       t   u   t   o   r   i   a   l   ,       y   o   u       h   a   v   e       c   r   e   a   t   e   d       a       d   a   t   a   b   a   s   e       a   n   d       p   u   t       i   n   f   o   r   m   a   t   i   o   n       i   n   t   o       i   t   .    N   o   w       y   o   u       h   a   v   e       a   t       l   e   a   s   t       o   n   e       r   e   c   o   r   d   ,       i   f       n   o   t       m   a   n   y       m   o   r   e   ,       i   n       y   o   u   r       d   a   t   a   b   a   s   e       y   o   u       w   i   l   l       b   e       w   a   n   t   i   n   g       t   o       k   n   o   w       h   o   w       y   o   u       c   a   n       o   u   t   p   u   t       t   h   i   s       d   a   t   a       u   s   i   n   g       P   H   P   .    &lt;   f   o   n   t       f   a   c   e   =   "   A   r   i   a   l   "       c   o   l   o   r   =   "   #   0   0   0   0   F   F   "   &gt;   &lt;   b   r       /   &gt;      
   S   E   L   E   C   T       *       F   R   O   M       c   o   n   t   a   c   t   s   &lt;   b   r       /   &gt;      
   &lt;   /   f   o   n   t   &gt;   &lt;   b   r       /   &gt;      
   T   h   i   s       i   s       a       b   a   s   i   c       M   y   S   Q   L       c   o   m   m   a   n   d       w   h   i   c   h       w   i   l   l       t   e   l   l       t   h   e       s   c   r   i   p   t       t   o       s   e   l   e   c   t       a   l   l       t   h   e       r   e   c   o   r   d   s       i   n       t   h   e       c   o   n   t   a   c   t   s       t   a   b   l   e   .       B   e   c   a   u   s   e       t   h   e   r   e       w   i   l   l       b   e       o   u   t   p   u   t       f   r   o   m       t   h   i   s       c   o   m   m   a   n   d       i   t       m   u   s   t       b   e       e   x   e   c   u   t   e   d       w   i   t   h       t   h   e       r   e   s   u   l   t   s       b   e   i   n   g       a   s   s   i   g   n   e   d       t   o       a       v   a   r   i   a   b   l   e   :   &lt;   b   r       /   &gt;      
   &lt;   f   o   n   t       f   a   c   e   =   "   A   r   i   a   l   "       c   o   l   o   r   =   "   #   0   0   0   0   F   F   "   &gt;   &lt;   b   r       /   &gt;      
   $   q   u   e   r   y   =   &amp;   q   u   o   t   ;   S   E   L   E   C   T       *       F   R   O   M       c   o   n   t   a   c   t   s   &amp;   q   u   o   t   ;   ;   &lt;   b   r       /   &gt;      
   $   r   e   s   u   l   t   =   m   y   s   q   l   _   q   u   e   r   y   (   $   q   u   e   r   y   )   ;   &lt;   b   r       /   &gt;      
   &lt;   /   f   o   n   t   &gt;   &lt;   b   r       /   &gt;      
   I   n       t   h   i   s       c   a   s   e       t   h   e       w   h   o   l   e       c   o   n   t   e   n   t   s       o   f       t   h   e       d   a   t   a   b   a   s   e       i   s       n   o   w       c   o   n   t   a   i   n   e   d       i   n       a       s   p   e   c   i   a   l       a   r   r   a   y       w   i   t   h       t   h   e       n   a   m   e       $   r   e   s   u   l   t   .       B   e   f   o   r   e       y   o   u       c   a   n       o   u   t   p   u   t       t   h   i   s       d   a   t   a       y   o   u       m   u   s   t       c   h   a   n   g   e       e   a   c   h       p   i   e   c   e       i   n   t   o       a       s   e   p   a   r   a   t   e       v   a   r   i   a   b   l   e   .    &lt;   f   o   n   t       f   a   c   e   =   "   A   r   i   a   l   "       c   o   l   o   r   =   "   #   0   0   0   0   9   9   "   &gt;   &lt;   b   i   g   &gt;   &lt;   b   &gt;   C   o   u   n   t   i   n   g       R   o   w   s   &lt;   /   b   &gt;   &lt;   /   b   i   g   &gt;   &lt;   /   f   o   n   t   &gt;   &lt;   b   r       /   &gt;      
   &lt;   b   r       /   &gt;      
   B   e   f   o   r   e       y   o   u       c   a   n       g   o       t   h   r   o   u   g   h       t   h   e       d   a   t   a       i   n       y   o   u   r       r   e   s   u   l   t       v   a   r   i   a   b   l   e   ,       y   o   u       m   u   s   t       k   n   o   w       h   o   w       m   a   n   y       d   a   t   a   b   a   s   e       r   o   w   s       t   h   e   r   e       a   r   e   .    &lt;   f   o   n   t       f   a   c   e   =   "   A   r   i   a   l   "       c   o   l   o   r   =   "   #   0   0   0   0   F   F   "   &gt;   $   n   u   m   =   m   y   s   q   l   _   n   u   m   r   o   w   s   (   $   r   e   s   u   l   t   )   ;   &lt;   /   f   o   n   t   &gt;   &lt;   b   r       /   &gt;

   T   h   i   s       w   i   l   l       s   e   t       t   h   e       v   a   l   u   e       o   f       $   n   u   m       t   o       b   e       t   h   e       n   u   m   b   e   r       o   f       r   o   w   s       s   t   o   r   e   d       i   n       $   r   e   s   u   l   t       (   t   h   e       o   u   t   p   u   t       y   o   u       g   o   t       f   r   o   m       t   h   e       d   a   t   a   b   a   s   e   )   .    $   u   s   e   r   n   a   m   e   =   &amp;   q   u   o   t   ;   u   s   e   r   n   a   m   e   &amp;   q   u   o   t   ;   ;   &lt;   b   r       /   &gt;      
   $   p   a   s   s   w   o   r   d   =   &amp;   q   u   o   t   ;   p   a   s   s   w   o   r   d   &amp;   q   u   o   t   ;   ;   &lt;   b   r       /   &gt;

   $   n   u   m   =   m   y   s   q   l   _   n   u   m   r   o   w   s   (   $   r   e   s   u   l   t   )   ;   &lt;   b   r       /   &gt;

   e   c   h   o       &amp;   q   u   o   t   ;   &amp;   l   t   ;   b   &amp;   g   t   ;   &amp;   l   t   ;   c   e   n   t   e   r   &amp;   g   t   ;   D   a   t   a   b   a   s   e       O   u   t   p   u   t   &amp;   l   t   ;   /   c   e   n   t   e   r   &amp;   g   t   ;   &amp;   l   t   ;   /   b   &amp;   g   t   ;   &amp;   l   t   ;   b   r   &amp;   g   t   ;   &amp;   l   t   ;   b   r   &amp;   g   t   ;   &amp;   q   u   o   t   ;   ;   &lt;   b   r       /   &gt;

   $   i   =   0   ;   &lt;   b   r       /   &gt;      
   w   h   i   l   e       (   $   i       &amp;   l   t   ;       $   n   u   m   )       {   &lt;   b   r       /   &gt;      
   &lt;   b   r       /   &gt;      
   $   f   i   r   s   t   =   m   y   s   q   l   _   r   e   s   u   l   t   (   $   r   e   s   u   l   t   ,   $   i   ,   &amp;   q   u   o   t   ;   f   i   r   s   t   &amp;   q   u   o   t   ;   )   ;   &lt;   b   r       /   &gt;      
   $   l   a   s   t   =   m   y   s   q   l   _   r   e   s   u   l   t   (   $   r   e   s   u   l   t   ,   $   i   ,   &amp;   q   u   o   t   ;   l   a   s   t   &amp;   q   u   o   t   ;   )   ;   &lt;   b   r       /   &gt;      
   $   p   h   o   n   e   =   m   y   s   q   l   _   r   e   s   u   l   t   (   $   r   e   s   u   l   t   ,   $   i   ,   &amp;   q   u   o   t   ;   p   h   o   n   e   &amp;   q   u   o   t   ;   )   ;   &lt;   b   r       /   &gt;      
   $   m   o   b   i   l   e   =   m   y   s   q   l   _   r   e   s   u   l   t   (   $   r   e   s   u   l   t   ,   $   i   ,   &amp;   q   u   o   t   ;   m   o   b   i   l   e   &amp;   q   u   o   t   ;   )   ;   &lt;   b   r       /   &gt;      
   $   f   a   x   =   m   y   s   q   l   _   r   e   s   u   l   t   (   $   r   e   s   u   l   t   ,   $   i   ,   &amp;   q   u   o   t   ;   f   a   x   &amp;   q   u   o   t   ;   )   ;   &lt;   b   r       /   &gt;      
   $   e   m   a   i   l   =   m   y   s   q   l   _   r   e   s   u   l   t   (   $   r   e   s   u   l   t   ,   $   i   ,   &amp;   q   u   o   t   ;   e   m   a   i   l   &amp;   q   u   o   t   ;   )   ;   &lt;   b   r       /   &gt;      
   $   w   e   b   =   m   y   s   q   l   _   r   e   s   u   l   t   (   $   r   e   s   u   l   t   ,   $   i   ,   &amp;   q   u   o   t   ;   w   e   b   &amp;   q   u   o   t   ;   )   ;   &lt;   b   r       /   &gt;      
   &lt;   b   r       /   &gt;      
   e   c   h   o       &amp;   q   u   o   t   ;   &amp;   l   t   ;   b   &amp;   g   t   ;   $   f   i   r   s   t       $   l   a   s   t   &amp;   l   t   ;   /   b   &amp;   g   t   ;   &amp;   l   t   ;   b   r   &amp;   g   t   ;   P   h   o   n   e   :       $   p   h   o   n   e   &amp;   l   t   ;   b   r   &amp;   g   t   ;   M   o   b   i   l   e   :       $   m   o   b   i   l   e   &amp;   l   t   ;   b   r   &amp;   g   t   ;   F   a   x   :       $   f   a   x   &amp;   l   t   ;   b   r   &amp;   g   t   ;   E   -   m   a   i   l   :       $   e   m   a   i   l   &amp;   l   t   ;   b   r   &amp;   g   t   ;   W   e   b   :       $   w   e   b   &amp;   l   t   ;   b   r   &amp;   g   t   ;   &amp;   l   t   ;   h   r   &amp;   g   t   ;   &amp;   l   t   ;   b   r   &amp;   g   t   ;   &amp;   q   u   o   t   ;   ;   &lt;   b   r       /   &gt;      
   &lt;   b   r       /   &gt;      
   $   i   +   +   ;   &lt;   b   r       /   &gt;      
   }   &lt;   b   r       /   &gt;      
   &lt;   b   r       /   &gt;      
   ?   &amp;   g   t   ;   &lt;   b   r       /   &gt;      
   &lt;   /   f   o   n   t   &gt;   &lt;   b   r       /   &gt;      
   &lt;   f   o   n   t       f   a   c   e   =   "   A   r   i   a   l   "       c   o   l   o   r   =   "   #   0   0   0   0   9   9   "   &gt;   &lt;   b   i   g   &gt;   &lt;   b   &gt;   P   a   r   t       5   &lt;   /   b   &gt;   &lt;   /   b   i   g   &gt;   &lt;   /   f   o   n   t   &gt;   &lt;   b   r       /   &gt;      
   &lt;   b   r       /   &gt;      
   I   n       p   a   r   t       5       I       w   i   l   l       s   h   o   w       y   o   u       h   o   w       y   o   u       c   a   n       f   o   r   m   a   t       t   h   e       o   u   t   p   u   t       o   f       y   o   u   r       d   a   t   a       a   n   d       h   o   w       t   o       s   e   l   e   c   t       d   i   f   f   e   r   e   n   t       d   a   t   a       f   r   o   m       t   h   e       d   a   t   a   b   a   s   e   .   &lt;   /   f   o   n   t   &gt;   &lt;   /   p   &gt;   
   
                                                           &lt;   !   -   -       B   o   t   t   o   m       N   a   v   i   g   a   t   i   o   n       -   -   &gt;   
                                                           &lt;   t   a   b   l   e       w   i   d   t   h   =   "   1   0   0   %   "       c   e   l   l   s   p   a   c   i   n   g   =   "   2   "       c   e   l   l   p   a   d   d   i   n   g   =   "   2   "       b   o   r   d   e   r   =   "   0   "   &gt;

                                                           &lt;   t   d       w   i   d   t   h   =   "   5   0   %   "       v   a   l   i   g   n   =   "   t   o   p   "   &gt;   &lt;   f   o   n   t       f   a   c   e   =   "   A   r   i   a   l   ,       H   e   l   v   e   t   i   c   a   ,       s   a   n   s   -   s   e   r   i   f   "       s   i   z   e   =   "   2   "   &gt;   &lt;   u   l   &gt;   &lt;   l   i   &gt;   &lt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   f   r   e   e   w   e   b   m   a   s   t   e   r   h   e   l   p   .   c   o   m   /   t   u   t   o   r   i   a   l   s   /   p   h   p   m   y   s   q   l   /   1   "   &gt;   P   a   r   t       1       -       I   n   t   r   o   d   u   c   t   i   o   n   &lt;   /   a   &gt;   &lt;   /   l   i   &gt;   &lt;   l   i   &gt;   &lt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   f   r   e   e   w   e   b   m   a   s   t   e   r   h   e   l   p   .   c   o   m   /   t   u   t   o   r   i   a   l   s   /   p   h   p   m   y   s   q   l   /   2   "   &gt;   P   a   r   t       2       -       S   e   t   t   i   n   g       U   p       T   h   e       D   a   t   a   b   a   s   e   &lt;   /   a   &gt;   &lt;   /   l   i   &gt;   &lt;   l   i   &gt;   &lt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   f   r   e   e   w   e   b   m   a   s   t   e   r   h   e   l   p   .   c   o   m   /   t   u   t   o   r   i   a   l   s   /   p   h   p   m   y   s   q   l   /   3   "   &gt;   P   a   r   t       3       -       I   n   s   e   r   t   i   n   g       I   n   f   o   r   m   a   t   i   o   n   &lt;   /   a   &gt;   &lt;   /   l   i   &gt;   &lt;   l   i   &gt;   &lt;   b   &gt;   P   a   r   t       4       -       D   i   s   p   l   a   y   i   n   g       D   a   t   a   &lt;   /   b   &gt;   &lt;   /   l   i   &gt;   &lt;   l   i   &gt;   &lt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   f   r   e   e   w   e   b   m   a   s   t   e   r   h   e   l   p   .   c   o   m   /   t   u   t   o   r   i   a   l   s   /   p   h   p   m   y   s   q   l   /   5   "   &gt;   P   a   r   t       5       -       M   o   r   e       O   u   t   p   u   t   s   &lt;   /   a   &gt;   &lt;   /   l   i   &gt;   &lt;   l   i   &gt;   &lt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   f   r   e   e   w   e   b   m   a   s   t   e   r   h   e   l   p   .   c   o   m   /   t   u   t   o   r   i   a   l   s   /   p   h   p   m   y   s   q   l   /   6   "   &gt;   P   a   r   t       6       -       S   i   n   g   l   e       R   e   c   o   r   d   s       &amp;       E   r   r   o   r       T   r   a   p   p   i   n   g   &lt;   /   a   &gt;   &lt;   /   l   i   &gt;   &lt;   l   i   &gt;   &lt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   f   r   e   e   w   e   b   m   a   s   t   e   r   h   e   l   p   .   c   o   m   /   t   u   t   o   r   i   a   l   s   /   p   h   p   m   y   s   q   l   /   7   "   &gt;   P   a   r   t       7       -       U   p   d   a   t   i   n   g       &amp;       D   e   l   e   t   i   n   g   &lt;   /   a   &gt;   &lt;   /   l   i   &gt;   &lt;   l   i   &gt;   &lt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   f   r   e   e   w   e   b   m   a   s   t   e   r   h   e   l   p   .   c   o   m   /   t   u   t   o   r   i   a   l   s   /   p   h   p   m   y   s   q   l   /   8   "   &gt;                                                                                &lt;   l   i   &gt;   &lt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   f   r   e   e   w   e   b   m   a   s   t   e   r   h   e   l   p   .   c   o   m   /   t   u   t   o   r   i   a   l   s   /   p   h   p   /   "   &gt;   P   H   P       T   u   t   o   r   i   a   l   &lt;   /   a   &gt;   &lt;   /   l   i   &gt;   &lt;   l   i   &gt;   &lt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   p   h   p   .   n   e   t   "   &gt;   O   f   f   i   c   i   a   l       P   H   P       H   o   m   e   p   a   g   e   &lt;   /   a   &gt;   &lt;   /   l   i   &gt;   &lt;   l   i   &gt;   &lt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   m   y   s   q   l   .   c   o   m   "   &gt;   O   f   f   i   c   i   a   l       M   y   S   Q   L       H   o   m   e   p   a   g   e   &lt;   /   a   &gt;   &lt;   /   l   i   &gt;   &lt;   l   i   &gt;   &lt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   f   r   e   e   w   e   b   m   a   s   t   e   r   h   e   l   p   .   c   o   m   /   s   t   a   t   i   c   /   t   u   t   o   r   i   a   l   s   /   p   h   p   m   y   s   q   l   /   e   x   a   m   p   l   e   .   z   i   p   "   &gt;   F   u   l   l       C   o   d   e       O   f       E   x   a   m   p   l   e   &lt;   /   a   &gt;   &lt;   /   l   i   &gt;   &lt;   l   i   &gt;   &lt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   p   h   p   b   u   i   l   d   e   r   .   c   o   m   "   &gt;   P   H   P       B   u   i   l   d   e   r   &lt;   /   a   &gt;   &lt;   /   l   i   &gt;   &lt;   l   i   &gt;   &lt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   m   e   t   e   o   r   s   u   r   f   .   c   o   m   /   c   g   i   -   b   i   n   /   s   m   a   r   t   s   e   a   r   c   h   /   s   m   a   r   t   s   e   a   r   c   h   .   c   g   i   ?   u   s   e   r   n   a   m   e   =   g   o   w   a   n   s   n   e   t   &amp;   k   e   y   w   o   r   d   s   =   p   h   p       m   y   s   q   l   "   &gt;   M   o   r   e       P   H   P   /   M   y   S   Q   L       S   i   t   e   s   &lt;   /   a   &gt;   &lt;   /   l   i   &gt;   &lt;   l   i   &gt;   &lt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   "   #   a   m   a   z   o   n   l   i   n   k   s   "   &gt;   R   e   l   a   t   e   d       R   e   a   d   i   n   g   &lt;   /   a   &gt;   &lt;   /   l   i   &gt;   
   &lt;   /   u   l   &gt;   &lt;   /   f   o   n   t   &gt;   
   &lt;   /   t   d   &gt;   
   
   	   	   	       &lt;   !   -   -       E   n   d       B   o   t   t   o   m       N   a   v   i   g   a   t   i   o   n       -   -   &gt;

   &lt;   s   c   r   i   p   t       a   s   y   n   c       s   r   c   =   "   /   /   p   a   g   e   a   d   2   .   g   o   o   g   l   e   s   y   n   d   i   c   a   t   i   o   n   .   c   o   m   /   p   a   g   e   a   d   /   j   s   /   a   d   s   b   y   g   o   o   g   l   e   .   j   s   "   &gt;   &lt;   /   s   c   r   i   p   t   &gt;

                       s   t   y   l   e   =   "   d   i   s   p   l   a   y   :   i   n   l   i   n   e   -   b   l   o   c   k   ;   w   i   d   t   h   :   7   2   8   p   x   ;   h   e   i   g   h   t   :   1   5   p   x   "   
                       d   a   t   a   -   a   d   -   c   l   i   e   n   t   =   "   c   a   -   p   u   b   -   1   3   6   0   8   7   4   7   6   8   0   4   2   0   0   6   "   
                       d   a   t   a   -   a   d   -   s   l   o   t   =   "   9   5   2   2   1   2   8   5   9   1   "   &gt;   &lt;   /   i   n   s   &gt;   
   &lt;   s   c   r   i   p   t   &gt;   
   (   a   d   s   b   y   g   o   o   g   l   e       =       w   i   n   d   o   w   .   a   d   s   b   y   g   o   o   g   l   e       |   |       [   ]   )   .   p   u   s   h   (   {   }   )   ;   
   &lt;   /   s   c   r   i   p   t   &gt;   &lt;   /   p   &gt;                       
   
                                                           &lt;   !   -   -       C   o   p   y   r   i   g   h   t       I   n   f   o       -   -   &gt;

                                   	   1   9   9   9       -       2   0   0   1       D   a   v   i   d       G   o   w   a   n   s   &lt;   /   f   o   n   t   &gt;   &lt;   f   o   n   t       f   a   c   e   =   "   A   r   i   a   l   ,       H   e   l   v   e   t   i   c   a   ,       s   a   n   s   -   s   e   r   i   f   "   &gt;

   &lt;   /   t   a   b   l   e   &gt;   
   
   &lt;   p       a   l   i   g   n   =   "   l   e   f   t   "   &gt;   
           &lt;   !   -   -   W   E   B   B   O   T       b   o   t   =   "   H   T   M   L   M   a   r   k   u   p   "       s   t   a   r   t   s   p   a   n       A   L   T   =   "   S   i   t   e       M   e   t   e   r   "       -   -   &gt;   
           &lt;   s   c   r   i   p   t       t   y   p   e   =   "   t   e   x   t   /   j   a   v   a   s   c   r   i   p   t   "       l   a   n   g   u   a   g   e   =   "   J   a   v   a   S   c   r   i   p   t   "   &gt;   v   a   r       s   i   t   e   =   "   g   o   w   a   n   s   n   e   t   "   &lt;   /   s   c   r   i   p   t   &gt;   
           &lt;   s   c   r   i   p   t       t   y   p   e   =   "   t   e   x   t   /   j   a   v   a   s   c   r   i   p   t   "       l   a   n   g   u   a   g   e   =   "   J   a   v   a   S   c   r   i   p   t   1   .   2   "       s   r   c   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   s   i   t   e   m   e   t   e   r   .   c   o   m   /   j   s   /   c   o   u   n   t   e   r   .   j   s   ?   s   i   t   e   =   g   o   w   a   n   s   n   e   t   "   &gt;   
   &lt;   /   s   c   r   i   p   t   &gt;   
           &lt;   n   o   s   c   r   i   p   t   &gt;       &lt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   s   i   t   e   m   e   t   e   r   .   c   o   m   /   s   t   a   t   s   .   a   s   p   ?   s   i   t   e   =   g   o   w   a   n   s   n   e   t   "       t   a   r   g   e   t   =   "   _   t   o   p   "   &gt;       
           &lt;   i   m   g       s   r   c   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   s   i   t   e   m   e   t   e   r   .   c   o   m   /   m   e   t   e   r   .   a   s   p   ?   s   i   t   e   =   g   o   w   a   n   s   n   e   t   "       a   l   t   =   "   S   i   t   e       M   e   t   e   r   "       b   o   r   d   e   r   =   0   &gt;   &lt;   /   a   &gt;       
           &lt;   /   n   o   s   c   r   i   p   t   &gt;       
           &lt;   !   -   -       C   o   p   y   r   i   g   h   t       (   c   )   2   0   0   0       S   i   t   e       M   e   t   e   r       -   -   &gt;   
           &lt;   !   -   -   W   E   B   B   O   T       b   o   t   =   "   H   T   M   L   M   a   r   k   u   p   "       E   n   d   s   p   a   n       -   -   &gt;   
           &lt;   !   -   -   W   E   B   B   O   T       b   o   t   =   "   H   T   M   L   M   a   r   k   u   p   "       s   t   a   r   t   s   p   a   n       A   L   T   =   "   S   i   t   e       M   e   t   e   r   "       -   -   &gt;   
           &lt;   s   c   r   i   p   t       t   y   p   e   =   "   t   e   x   t   /   j   a   v   a   s   c   r   i   p   t   "       l   a   n   g   u   a   g   e   =   "   J   a   v   a   S   c   r   i   p   t   "   &gt;   v   a   r       s   i   t   e   =   "   s   m   7   g   o   w   a   n   s   n   e   t   f   w   h   "   &lt;   /   s   c   r   i   p   t   &gt;   
           &lt;   s   c   r   i   p   t       t   y   p   e   =   "   t   e   x   t   /   j   a   v   a   s   c   r   i   p   t   "       l   a   n   g   u   a   g   e   =   "   J   a   v   a   S   c   r   i   p   t   1   .   2   "       s   r   c   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   s   m   7   .   s   i   t   e   m   e   t   e   r   .   c   o   m   /   j   s   /   c   o   u   n   t   e   r   .   j   s   ?   s   i   t   e   =   s   m   7   g   o   w   a   n   s   n   e   t   f   w   h   "   &gt;   
   &lt;   /   s   c   r   i   p   t   &gt;   
           &lt;   n   o   s   c   r   i   p   t   &gt;       &lt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   s   m   7   .   s   i   t   e   m   e   t   e   r   .   c   o   m   /   s   t   a   t   s   .   a   s   p   ?   s   i   t   e   =   s   m   7   g   o   w   a   n   s   n   e   t   f   w   h   "       t   a   r   g   e   t   =   "   _   t   o   p   "   &gt;       
           &lt;   i   m   g       s   r   c   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   s   m   7   .   s   i   t   e   m   e   t   e   r   .   c   o   m   /   m   e   t   e   r   .   a   s   p   ?   s   i   t   e   =   s   m   7   g   o   w   a   n   s   n   e   t   f   w   h   "       a   l   t   =   "   S   i   t   e       M   e   t   e   r   "       b   o   r   d   e   r   =   0   &gt;   &lt;   /   a   &gt;       
           &lt;   /   n   o   s   c   r   i   p   t   &gt;       
           &lt;   !   -   -       C   o   p   y   r   i   g   h   t       (   c   )   2   0   0   0       S   i   t   e       M   e   t   e   r       -   -   &gt;   
           &lt;   !   -   -   W   E   B   B   O   T       b   o   t   =   "   H   T   M   L   M   a   r   k   u   p   "       E   n   d   s   p   a   n       -   -   &gt;   
   &lt;   /   p   &gt;   
   &lt;   /   b   o   d   y   &gt;   
   &lt;   /   h   t   m   l   &gt;
  </script>
 </head>
</html>
